recipe.title: Peruvian Pisco Sour
ingredients: 1 part simple syrup (granulated sugar melted in water)
instructions: Blend together Pisco, lime juice, simple syrup, and egg white with ice. Strain mixture into old-fashioned glasses. Top with a few drops of Angostura bitters.
